title: 'Urgent Task': China's Great Wall Is Crumbling
text: BING NEWS: China's Great Wall: 30 Percent of UNESCO World Heritage Site Gone vice chairman of the nonprofit Great Wall Society, told NBC News on Tuesday, calling for the creation of a systematic conservation plan. "The urgent task is to protect what is left."
